name: Cutie Boom
description:
This is probably a nice game. You have to Kill those Cute Ghosts which are actually very Dangerous. So kill the cute white Ghosts but remember DON'T KILL the Red ones, they are Good. Once the game is over The story is revealed.

Share this game and let them enjoy too.

Check out my website for some more cool things Here

If you like my work then you can donate a Rupee or a cent. That would be really helpful.
